document_data.name: Fire-Eggs
document_data.mainbody: '''Fire-eggs''' were a type of [[egg]]-based dish commonly found being served by higher quality inns within cites and towns.{{Cite web/theedverse/2019-10-06 - Four-course meals of the Realms}}
document_data.Description: This dish consisted of hard-boiled eggs — usually sourced from a [[chicken|hen]], but sometimes from a [[duck]] — that had been cut in half to release their yolks. These yolks were then blended with either [[honey]] or [[mustard]] and then spooned back into the cut half of the egg.
